title: Batman.Arkham.Origins.Cold.Cold.Heart-CODEX
description:
Batman.Arkham.Origins.Cold.Cold.Heart-CODEX

CODEX PRESENTS:
   
                               Wargame Red Dragon 

     Release Date :  4/2014                         Protection : Steam
     Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action 


   Return to Gotham City to ring in the New Year, Arkham Origins style
   When the CEO of GothCorp is kidnapped, by Mr. Freeze, BatmanT sets out
   to bring him to justice. Along the way, he will uncover the tragic
   history of his new enemy, prompting our hero to attempt the impossible:
   save the victim AND the villain 


    - Extract
    - Burn or mount the .iso
    - Run setup.exe and install
    - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
    - Play 

    This is the main game + the Cold Cold Heart Addon DLC 

    NFO FIX: guess we pred with the wrong nfo .. sorry about that 

    Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
    online
